message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to counteroffer at $110.
Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to counteroffer at $115.
Hi Bob, thank you for your latest counteroffer. I'm still not willing to go as low as $115, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $123.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to counteroffer at $120.
